metadata.title: CVE-2013-7484 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
Zabbix before 5.0 represents passwords in the users table with unsaltedMD5.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7484` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zabbix-agent - 1:5.0.0+dfsg-1
zabbix-agent2 - 1:5.0.0+dfsg-1
zabbix-frontend-php - 1:5.0.0+dfsg-1
zabbix-java-gateway - 1:5.0.0+dfsg-1
zabbix-proxy-mysql - 1:5.0.0+dfsg-1
zabbix-proxy-pgsql - 1:5.0.0+dfsg-1
zabbix-proxy-sqlite3 - 1:5.0.0+dfsg-1
zabbix-server-mysql - 1:5.0.0+dfsg-1
zabbix-server-pgsql - 1:5.0.0+dfsg-1
zabbix-web-service - 1:5.0.0+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zabbix package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:5.0.0+dfsg-1').
